bibl.title: P78 (P. Oxy. XXXIV 2684): The Epistle of Jude on an Amulet?

series.title: Texts and Editions for New Testament Study.

bibl.title: New Testament Manuscripts. Their Texts and Their World

bibl.note: P78 = P. Oxy. XXXIV, 2684 (= van Haelst 558). - 1. Description of P78. - 2. Magic and the Use and Function of Amulets in Early Christianity. - 3. The Epistle of Jude on an Amulet? - 4. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: WASSERMAN Tommy, P78 (P. Oxy. XXXIV 2684): The Epistle of Jude on an Amulet?
Thomas J. KRAUS and Tobias NICKLAS (Edd.), New Testament Manuscripts. Their Texts and Their World = Texts and Editions for New Testament Study. 2 (Leiden - Boston, 2006) pp. 137-160.
